TopicTitle: Fuel Dumping (Burning a Liquid Oxidizer Engein Without Enabling Liquid/Oxidizer)

Articles.Content:
I just discovered that you can no longer toggle off liquid fuel/oxidizer and have your liquid-oxidizer engine burn away the toggled one without producing thrust. This was very useful when creating space planes/shuttles, as it would help with re-entry and landing (balancing your ship). This was removed in update 0.23. I would love to have this feature again.

Thanks

-LonelyWindchime
